articles.title: Could these big expandable habitats help humanity settle the moon and Mars? - Space.com
articles.description: The startup Max Space has big plans for its habitat tech, which will get its first in-space test in 2026.

articles.title: Romeo & Juliet: Hundreds show support for actress abused online - BBC.com
articles.description: Francesca Amewudah-Rivers has been trolled online with "racist and misogynistic abuse" after casting.

articles.title: CERN pays tribute to Peter Higgs - CERN
articles.description: Peter Higgs has passed away at the age of 94. An iconic figure in modern science, Higgs in 1964 postulated the existence of the eponymous Higgs boson. Its discovery at CERN in 2012 was the crowning achievement of the Standard Model (SM) of particle physics – …
articles.content: Peter Higgs has passed away at the age of 94. An iconic figure in modern science, Higgs in 1964 postulated the existence of the eponymous Higgs boson. Its discovery at CERN in 2012 was the crowning a… [+2057 chars]

articles.author: Sharmishta Sarkar
articles.title: Color me surprised: Kobo's finally beaten Kindle with its latest ereaders - TechRadar
articles.description: The Kobo Libra Colour and the Kobo Clara Colour join the Clara BW as the latest ereaders on the market
articles.content: Color ereaders aren’t new – brands like Onyx and PocketBook have been making them for a while – but I’ve been waiting a long time to see a color-screen Kindle or Kobo. It’s finally happened with the … [+6253 chars]
